questions: What is an array method?
answer: functions built-in to JavaScript that we can apply to arrays.

questions: What is the array method .push used for?
answer: Adds new elements to the end of an array, and returns the new length.

questions: What is the array method .pop used for?
answer: Removes the last element of an array, and returns that element.

questions: What is the array method .shift used for?
answer: Removes the first element of an array, and returns that element.

questions: What is the array method .unshift used for?
answer: Adds new elements to the beginning of an array, and returns the new length.

questions: What is the array method .concat used for?
answer: Joins arrays and returns an array with the joined arrays.

questions: What is the array method .join used for?
answer: Joins all elements of an array into a string.

questions: What is the array method .slice used for?
answer: Selects a part of an array, and returns the new array.

questions: What is the array method .indexof used for?
answer: Search the array for an element and returns its position.

questions: What is the array method .includes used for?
answer: Checks if an array contains the specified element.

questions: What is the array method .find used for?
answer: Returns the value of the first element in an array that pass a test.

questions: What is the array method .findIndex used for?
answer: Returns the index of the first element in an array that pass a test.

questions: What is the array method .map used for?
answer: Creates a new array with the result of calling a function for each array element

questions: What is the array method .filter used for?
answer: Creates a new array with every element in an array that pass a test.

questions: What is the array method .reduce used for?
answer: Reduce the values of an array to a single value.

questions: What is the array method .every used for?
answer: Checks if every element in an array pass a test.

questions: What is the array method .some used for?
answer: Checks if any of the elements in an array pass a test.

questions: What is the array method .reverse used for?
answer: Reverses the order of the elements in an array.

questions: What is the array method .at used for?
answer: Takes an integer value and returns the item at that index,.

questions: What is the array method .some used for?
answer: Checks if any of the elements in an array pass a test.

questions: What is the array method .sort used for?
answer: Sorts the elements of an array.

questions: What is the array method .toString used for?
answer: Converts an array to a string, and returns the result.

questions: What is the array method .valueOf used for?
answer: Returns the primitive value of an array.

questions: What is the array method .includes used for?
answer: Check if an array contains the specified element.

questions: What is the array method .fill used for?
answer: Fill the elements in an array with a static value.

questions: What is the array method .every used for?
answer: Checks if every element in an array pass a test
